short_summary: Motor-pump subassembly, hydraulic; access to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax
description: Estimated quantity of commodity: 8. Duration of contract: 2023-04-01 to 2024-03-31. Time frame of delivery: 2023-04-01 to 2024-03-31; including CETA requirements.
full_summary:
**Tender Title**
-----------------
MOTOR/PUMP SUBASSEMBLY, HYDRAULIC

**Contract Reference**
-------------------
PW-22-01013838 (amendment 1)

**Publication Information**
-------------------------

* **Publication Date**: 2022-11-17
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-01-09T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2022-12-16

**Contract Details**
---------------------

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
* **End User**: Department of National Defence
* **Request for Proposal**: The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supply of hydraulic motor pump subassemblies.

**Description of Goods and Services**
-----------------------------------

* Estimated quantity: 8
* Duration of contract: 2023-04-01 to 2024-03-31
* Time frame of delivery: 2023-04-01 to 2024-03-31
* Any conditions for participation of suppliers not specified in solicitation documentation

**Goods and Services**
----------------------

* **Item 1**: Motor-pump subassembly, hydraulic
	+ Part No.: 170158-20-025
	+ NCAGE: L0AV8
	+ Quantity: 4
	+ Unit of issue: EA
	+ Delivery to: CFB Esquimalt
* **Item 2**: Motor-pump subassembly, hydraulic
	+ Part No.: 170158-20-025
	+ NCAGE: L0AV8
	+ Quantity: 4
	+ Unit of issue: EA
	+ Delivery to: CFB Halifax

**Submission Requirements**
---------------------------

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

* **Name**: Normandin, Jean-Pierre
* **Email**: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone**: 819-939-3674
* **Address**: Directorate Maritime Procurement, 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

**Attachments**
---------------

* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Amendment to RFP

Note: I removed some redundant information and rewrote the text to make it more concise and professional. I also changed the formatting to make it easier to read. Let
